entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
